The seventh foal found the seventh and last lightness under a grain of sand, in a reversed time. After galloping backwards, he discovered the lightness of the unexpected and was able to fly. https://t.co/xCB73p1fpE
The sixth foal found the sixth lightness in one of his dreams. After an outstanding performance in a circus, he was able to fly thanks to the lightness of imagination. https://t.co/uKWGlHVI4g

The fifth foal found the fifth lightness when the wind rose and carried him away, far, far away. He landed in a world where all his senses were disrupted. He discovered the lightness of uncertainty and unimaginable, which allowed him to fly. https://t.co/wtCt4fmMsB

The fourth foal found the fourth lightness on the other side of the world, in a middle of an immense flower field. He witnessed a love meeting that allowed him to discover the lightness of love. Then, he was able to fly. https://t.co/vwJYGNtyYU

The third foal found the third lightness in the sound of a voice. He attended a great (but quite curious) opera, that allowed him to fly thanks to the lightness of voice and vibrations. https://t.co/IcFPC8AftX

The second foal found the second lightness during a very specific ans small season that lasts only three days. He assists to the gloves migration, and discover the lightness of travel and discovery that allowed him to fly. https://t.co/tIpiaEC8ih

The first foal found the first lightness in a simple village, at the end of a simple road, where at a certain hour, on a certain day, and on a certain month each year, gravity is reversed. When the sky became the earth, he flew thanks to the lightness of inversion. https://t.co/QPXYMDW1Wi

Do you know the story of Pegasus and his quest for the seven lightness ? 

Legend tells that Pegasus had seven foals, as beautiful as the sun, as strong as thunder and as lively as the storm, but without wings. In order to fly, each of them had to find their own way to lightness.

Discover #LaFabriqueDeLaLegerete, the poetic and cinematographic show behind the myth of Pegasus. A unique experience conceived by the artisans of the dream from October 21 to 28, 2022, in Paris. More information on https://t.co/Om62ire73Z
